itemProperties.effect:
You put out the hellfire with water from the bucket
and the Lord of the Underworld turns into steam.
You recite a verse from a book, but the Lord of the Underworld does not get kinder
The old sword is melted, the Lord of the Underworld is laughing at your pathetic attempt
Lord of the Underworld is not hungry
Front-end textbook burns in hellfire. For some reason, an unhealthy smile appears on your face
